description: Enterprise techniques used by SLOWDRIFT, ATT&CK software S0218 v1.1
name: SLOWDRIFT (S0218)

techniques.comment: [SLOWDRIFT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0218) downloads additional payloads.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[SLOWDRIFT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0218) collects and sends system information to its C2.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[SLOWDRIFT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0218) uses cloud based services for C2.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
